sourcesContent:
<template>
	<div id="slider">
	<vue-flux
		:options="fluxOptions"
		:images="fluxImages"
		:transitions="fluxTransitions"
		ref="slider">
	</vue-flux>
		<button @click="$refs.slider.showImage('next')">NEXT</button>
</template>

<script>
import { VueFlux, Transitions } from 'vue-flux';
import 'vue-flux/dist/vue-flux.css';


export default {
   components: {
      'vue-flux': VueFlux
   },

   data: () => ({
      fluxOptions: {
         autoplay: true
      },
      fluxImages: [
         'URL1',
         'URL2',
         'URL3'
      ],
      fluxTransitions: {
         transitionTurn3d: Transitions.transitionTurn3d
      }
   })
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.custom-slider {
	display: block;
	text-align: center;
	flex-direction: row;
	justify-content: center;
	height: 700px;
}
.slide-container {
	max-width: 800px;
	position: relative;
	margin: auto;
}
.prev, .next {
	cursor: pointer;
	position: absolute;
	top: 50%;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
	width: 60px;
	height: 60px;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	border-radius: 50%;
	color: #8c7f73;
	font-size: 30px;
	background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0);
	transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
}
.prev{
	left: 20px;
}
.next {
	right: 20px;
}
.prev:hover, .next:hover {
	background-color: #faf0e6;
}
.slide-img{
	width: 70%;
	height: 700px;
	object-fit: cover;
	object-position: center;
}
.slide-dot{
	text-align: center;
}
.dot {
	cursor: pointer;
	height: 10px;
	width: 10px;
	margin: 0 2px;
	background-color: #8c7f73;
	border-radius: 50%;
	display: inline-block;
	transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
}
.active, .dot:hover {
	background-color:white;
}
.fade {
	animation-name: fade;
	animation-duration: 1s;
}

</style>
